content.query:
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://nytaxidatastore2.dfs.core.windows.net/new-york-taxi/rides/zone_lookups/taxi_zone_lookup (2).csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    )
WITH(
    locationid BIGINT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(1000) 2,
    zone VARCHAR(1000) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(1000) 4
) AS [result]
